title: 2/24/22 DPS Hour 2 - Covino & Rich Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 2/24/22 DPS Hour 2 - Covino & Rich Guest Hosting
description:
C & R close out their Tom Brady topic and dive into the LeBron James/Bronny topic. What NBA teams would let LeBron direct their franchise after drafting his son? The fellas have very entertaing stories about their dads embarrassing them and take calls from around the country about LeBron's final years in the league.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
